alert.note: Alert for Central Piscataquis; Northeast Aroostook; Northern Penobscot; Northern Piscataquis; Northwest Aroostook; Southern Piscataquis (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 30 at 2:53AM EDT by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...An area of heavy snow showers will affect central Piscataquis... north central Aroostook and north central Penobscot Counties... At 252 AM EDT...An area of heavy snow showers was along a line extending from near Dickey to near Telos Lake to near Kingsbury Plantation...and moving northeast AT 30 MPH. Locations impacted include... Dover-Foxcroft, Fort Kent, Greenville, Guilford, Eagle Lake, Allagash, Ripogenus, Deboullie Mountain, Mount Katahdin, Monson, Blanchard, Allagash Township, Ebeemee, Kingsbury Plantation . This includes the following highways... US Highway 1 near Fort Kent. State Highway 11 between Eagle Lake and Fort Kent. * Winds in excess of 25 mph are possible with this area of heavy snow showers. * Visibilities will drop quickly to less than a half mile in this area of heavy snow showers. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.
